description: ABLATION: energy_reg only. Langevin generates negatives, energy_reg=0.01 constrains energy scale, contrastive weight is negligible (0.001) so contrastive is essentially inactive. Tests hypothesis: energy_reg alone kills denoising by clamping |E| ~ O(1), which forces ||dE/dx|| ~ O(1), making pred = dE.sum()/dx / 2048 ~ 0.0005 â€” far below target eps ~ N(0,1). Expected: MSE stuck at ~1.0, pred_norm ~ 0.001, cos ~ 0.
notes: Ablation q212: energy_loss_weight=0.001 (near-zero contrastive, negligible signal) but energy_reg_weight=0.01 (same as q210). If denoising fails here too => reg is the culprit. If denoising succeeds => something else in q210 is the issue.
